titles.title: Financial Empowerment and Protection Act
Financial Empowerment and Protection Act
To require covered companies to allow consenting cohabitating adults to open joint accounts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
